summary: REQ-1 appears implemented in LilyCard by removing horizontal inset at `lg`+ via `lg:inset-x-0` while keeping vertical inset (`inset-y-2`), rounded corners, opacity transition, and non-interactive hover layer. However, additional unrelated file modifications are present in the diff summary (project metadata and a large frontend summary text file) that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project metadata/state tracking (new_feature_requests entries marked pending) unrelated to the requested LilyCard hover inset change.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constrained changes to the LilyCard hover background behavior only and did not request project state/metadata updates.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified a large frontend summary text file describing many unrelated UI/layout features across multiple pages/components.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly says not to adjust unrelated spacing/layout and only to change the LilyCard hover background inset behavior on desktop; updating this summary file is not requested and includes unrelated scope.
